location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘View from village of Lakmat Magharam (ruined) about 1½ miles west of Sanah [Ṣanʻā']’

mods.abstract: Black and white reproduction of an ink illustration, a panoramic view of the terrain from Jabal Hesha, on the left-hand side of the view, to Jabal Shem on the right-hand side. The chief hills are annotated, as are some other topographic features. A note at the bottom of the map states that cultivated areas are indicated with horizontal hatched lines.
